Package org.jgentleframework.utils

Class Summary
AnnotationUtils The Class AnnotationUtils.
Assertor Chịu trách nhiệm xác nhận các thông tin trạng thái của các entities, nếu thông tin hoặc trạng thái không phù hợp sẽ ném ra các ngoại lệ tương ứng.
CollectionUtils Miscellaneous collection utility methods.
ConvertUtils The Class ConverUtils.
DefinitionUtils Miscellaneous definition utility methods.
ExceptionUtils General utilities for handling exception.
FileObjectUtils Simple utility methods for file and stream copying.
InstanceUtils Mainly for use within the framework, but to some degree also useful for application classes.
ObjectClassUtils Miscellaneous class utility methods.
ObjectUtils Simple utility methods for Object controller.
ReflectUtils Provides some of static methods in order to execute common reflect operations.
RegularToolkit The Class RegularToolkit.
Serialize The Class Serialize.
SystemPropertiesUtils Miscellaneous System Properties (System.getProperty(String)) utility methods.
UniqueNumberGenerator The Class UniqueNumberGenerator.
Utils The Class Utils.
